title: Taj Hotels
summary: Taj Hotels is a chain of luxury hotels and a subsidiary of the Indian Hotels Company Limited,[1] headquartered at Express Towers, Nariman Point, Mumbai.[2] Incorporated by the founder of the Tata Group, Jamsetji Tata, in 1903,[3][4] the company is a part of the Tata Group, one of India's largest business conglomerates. The company employed over 20,000 people in the year 2010.[5][6]
